snippet: A coal producer owned by a longtime critic of President Obama’s energy policies will lay off nearly 160 workers at Illinois and Utah mines, blaming the president for a “war on coal.”
abstract: Murray Energy Corporation says it will lay off 102 workers at its West Ridge Mine in Utah and 54 at its underground mine in Southern Illinois, blaming Pres Obama's 'war on coal.'
lead_paragraph: A coal producer owned by a longtime critic of President Obama’s energy policies will lay off nearly 160 workers at Illinois and Utah mines, blaming the president for a “war on coal.”

headline.main: Obama Critic Plans Layoffs at His Coal Mines
